entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cape Race
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
